name: Chase's Choices
description:
Chase's Choices

Chase’s Choices is an interactive story game about a high school sophomore named Chase, who transfers to Roitville High School. Forced to leave his friends and old life behind, he must now start over in a new place by making friends to become memorable and avoid social ridicule. The choices you have him make affect his respect level, which impact how people will view him and change the story at large. At certain times, he will even make his own respect-affecting choices. However, as Chase will soon find out, things get way more complicated than your average high school drama.
